reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Inspiring teacher with a passion for radioactivity. Lab work is extensive but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Theoretical Physics
reviews.review: Exceptional lectures on relativity. Complex material but explained very well.

reviews.subject: Calculus
reviews.review: Great insights into calculus. The coursework is challenging but worth it.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Pioneering ideas in computing. Her approach to teaching is methodical and clear.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures on evolution. Field trips are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Molecular Biology
reviews.review: Excellent course on DNA. Her attention to detail in lab sessions is incredible.

reviews.subject: Electrical Engineering
reviews.review: Innovative teaching style. Labs are intensive but very educational.

reviews.subject: Cryptography
reviews.review: Brilliant insights into cryptography. Challenging assignments but very rewarding.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures on the solar system. Observational sessions are fantastic.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Creative and interdisciplinary approach. Projects are complex but engaging.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Very clear explanations of genetic principles. The lab work is a bit tedious.

reviews.subject: Nursing
reviews.review: Compassionate and knowledgeable. The practical sessions are very hands-on.

reviews.subject: Microbiology
reviews.review: Interesting course on antibiotics. Labs are well-organized but challenging.

reviews.subject: Electromagnetism
reviews.review: Deep understanding of electromagnetism. Lectures are thorough but fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about environmental conservation. The course projects are very impactful.

reviews.subject: Quantum Mechanics
reviews.review: Dynamic and engaging lectures. Complex topics made accessible.

reviews.subject: Botany
reviews.review: Organized and systematic approach. The classification labs are very detailed.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Great teacher with a focus on crystallography. Labs are difficult but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Quantum Physics
reviews.review: Mind-bending lectures on quantum theory. Requires a strong math background.

reviews.subject: Atomic Physics
reviews.review: Complex topics explained in a simple manner. The coursework is challenging but manageable.
